raidhandler.usage: Usage: !raid [username] | !raid [toggle / lookup / setreward / setincomingmessage / setnewincomingmessage / setoutgoingmessage / setoutgoingmessagespam]
raidhandler.toggle.enabled: Raid alerts have successfully been enabled.
raidhandler.toggle.disabled: Raid alerts have successfully been disabled.
raidhandler.reward.set: Successfully set the raid reward to $1.
raidhandler.minviewers.set: Successfully set the raid minimum viewers to $1.
raidhandler.inc.message.set: Successfully updated the incoming raid message!
raidhandler.new.inc.message.set: Successfully updated the new incoming raid message!
raidhandler.out.message.set: Successfully updated the outgoing raid message!
raidhandler.spam.amount.set: Successfully updated the outgoing raid spam amount!
raidhandler.lookup.user: $1 has raided this channel a total of $2 time(s). Their last raid was on $3 with $4 viewers.
raidhandler.out.messageoffline.set: Successfully updated the outgoing raid offline warning message!
